body:
Here it is a prestigious school meant only for the best and the highest of their said field of expertise. This is an academy meant for only high school students to excel further in their education and socialise with the professionals - other students. 
That said, there are only limited spots available within this reputable school.
So... in order to make it in, please fill out the application below and state what you excel in. I'm looking for 14 people to be in this mystery envoking fanfiction.

Your application:

Name:
Age: (must be a high school age)
Personality:
Gender:
Height: Weight:
Desired Role:


- Ultimate Magazine Model
- Ultimate Programmer
- Ultimate Heir
- Ultimate Pro Golfer
- Ultimate Dancer (DebateCards)
- Ultimate Pop Star
- Ultimate Fortune-teller (clubmember44)
- Ultimate Gambler (Chris)
- Ultimate Martial-Arts Fighter
- Ultimate Gunslinger (Zedther)
- Ultimate Otaku
- Ultimate Author (you have a hidden.... personality)
- Ultimate Gang Leader
- Ultimate Class Monitor


Remember - LIMITED SPOTS AND ONLY FOR THE FIRST 14 WHO PLACE DIBS ON THEIR ROLES.

I hope to see you in such a respected school very soon!

- Ultimate Detective Shuni Shizuma (Crystal_Sonic) and Ultimate Good Luck Naegi Makoto (daviscrystal).

replies.body: He's going to help me a little bit; after all, he was the one who came up with the basic seed of the story. Um, what should I change the title to? I can't really think of something... and maybe it shouldn't be Minecraft related... Maybe something to do with real people... So.... Hmmm....

reply_to.body: So is davis going to help you write it? Or will he just be in th e story it self?
reply_to.body_tagged: So is davis going to help you write it? Or will he just be in th e story it self?

replies.body: Thank you everyone so far who are supporting this! I know you're not doing too much, but it seriously means a lot to me! And we're not even halfway with character profiles yet!
replies.body_tagged: Thank you everyone so far who are supporting this! I know you're not doing too much, but it seriously means a lot to me! And we're not even halfway with character profiles yet!

replies.body: You're my sister, Aegloswen. (even though this family thing still isn't going on I want to feel like I've got a sibling) How can I be annoyed at you? But I looked at the title and thought of a better way to say it than just a plain English Title. I envisioned it to be a story that everyone on Avicus (hopefully) will read and be like: 'I read this story called.... uhh... here, look at the title...' and then their friend or family member would look at the title, be puzzled, then read it. When they understand what and how the story unfolds, they're going to be like: 'Wooo! I read this book and it's called... uhh....' My daydreams.

replies.body: Yeah.... I just wonder a little bit why it's slow gaining spots. Maybe people don't like a fanfiction about school?
replies.body_tagged: Yeah.... I just wonder a little bit why it's slow gaining spots. Maybe people don't like a fanfiction about school?

replies.body: Thanks so much, Aegloswen; it really does mean a lot. I've decided that if no one else applies for an application, I'll substitute characters that I've made up.
